${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
${modID}:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: You draw one less card next turn. Gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:AMAZING.NAME: AMAZING
${modID}:AMAZING.DESCRIPTION: When playing 3 attacks in a single turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Assist.NAME: Assist
${modID}:Assist.DESCRIPTION: Get a random card to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Assist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Get a random card to add to your hand. It costs zero this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Athleticism.NAME: Athleticism
${modID}:Athleticism.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 2 cards. NL Your debuffs decrease by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BackSpinKick.NAME: Back Spin Kick
${modID}:BackSpinKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This costs 1 less for each attack played.

${modID}:Barry.NAME: Barry the Quokka
${modID}:Barry.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:BlastOff.NAME: Blast Off
${modID}:BlastOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL Increase this card's COST by 1 this combat.

${modID}:BlueBlur.NAME: Blue Blur
${modID}:BlueBlur.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, your first move will play twice. Exhaust.
${modID}:BlueBlur.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, your first move will play twice.

${modID}:BlueTornado.NAME: Blue Tornado
${modID}:BlueTornado.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add a Ring to your hand.
${modID}:BlueTornado.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add 2 Rings to your hand.

${modID}:Boost.NAME: Boost
${modID}:Boost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. When you play a Ring, return this card from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:BouncePad.NAME: Bounce Pad
${modID}:BouncePad.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! Rings to your hand.

${modID}:ChangeFormation.NAME: Change Formation
${modID}:ChangeFormation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Convert your Levels to Speed, Flight, or Power.

${modID}:ChangeFormationSpeed.NAME: Speed Formation
${modID}:ChangeFormationSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your Levels to Speed.

${modID}:ChangeFormationFlight.NAME: Flight Formation
${modID}:ChangeFormationFlight.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your Levels to Flight.

${modID}:ChangeFormationPower.NAME: Power Formation
${modID}:ChangeFormationPower.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your Levels to Power.

${modID}:Checkpoint.NAME: Checkpoint
${modID}:Checkpoint.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have a Ring in your hand. Shuffle Super Sonic Form into your draw pile.
${modID}:Checkpoint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have a Ring in your hand. Shuffle an upgraded Super Sonic Form into your draw pile.

${modID}:ClawsUnleashed.NAME: Claws Unleashed
${modID}:ClawsUnleashed.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have a channeled Dark Orb. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Crouch.NAME: Crouch
${modID}:Crouch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand.

${modID}:CuteCouple.NAME: Cute Couple
${modID}:CuteCouple.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It costs 0 for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CuteCouple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It costs 0 for the rest of combat.

${modID}:DashPanel.NAME: Dash Panel
${modID}:DashPanel.DESCRIPTION: Play !M! cards to the right of this card.

${modID}:DirectJump.NAME: Direct Jump
${modID}:DirectJump.DESCRIPTION: When you play a skill this turn, add a Ring to your hand.

${modID}:DizzySpin.NAME: Dizzy Spin
${modID}:DizzySpin.DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of ALL cards in your hand for this turn. Apply Dizzy to ALL enemies twice.
${modID}:DizzySpin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Randomize the cost of ALL cards in your hand for this turn. Apply Dizzy to ALL enemies twice.

${modID}:Drift.NAME: Drift
${modID}:Drift.DESCRIPTION: Activate the passive effects of NL your Orbs 3X times.
${modID}:Drift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Activate the passive effects of NL your Orbs 3(X + 1) times.

${modID}:DropDash.NAME: Drop Dash
${modID}:DropDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you exhausted a card this turn, gain 2 [E].

${modID}:EndlessBoost.NAME: Endless Boost
${modID}:EndlessBoost.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Every turn, gain 1 [E].
${modID}:EndlessBoost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Every turn, gain 1 [E].

${modID}:Extender.NAME: Mid-Air Action Trick
${modID}:Extender.DESCRIPTION: If you have Vigor at the start of your turn, choose to gain 2 Orb slots, 2 additional cards, or 2 [E].
${modID}:Extender.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. If you have Vigor at the start of your turn, choose to gain 2 Orb slots, 2 additional cards, or 2 [E].

${modID}:FightingBuddies.NAME: Fighting Buddies
${modID}:FightingBuddies.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:FightingBuddies.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:FireSomersault.NAME: Fire Somersault
${modID}:FireSomersault.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Crest_of_Fire. Deal !D! damage. If exhausted, add another Fire Somersault to your hand. It does !M! additional damage.

${modID}:FireTackle.NAME: Fire Tackle
${modID}:FireTackle.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Crest_of_Fire. Deal !D! damage. When you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage to the attacker.

${modID}:FlagPole.NAME: Flag Pole
${modID}:FlagPole.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Frost for each Ring in your hand.
${modID}:FlagPole.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Ring to your hand. Channel a Frost for each Ring in your hand.

${modID}:Gizoid.NAME: Gizoid
${modID}:Gizoid.DESCRIPTION: Show me your power. Or I shall not obey. I represent all things, and shall become Gizoid, the conquerer of all.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Don't tease him too much, okay?
Should I be glad that...I was born...?

${modID}:GizoidAmy.NAME: Data - Amy Rose
${modID}:GizoidAmy.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random potion. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GizoidChaos.NAME: Data - Chaos
${modID}:GizoidChaos.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GizoidE102r.NAME: Data - E102r
${modID}:GizoidE102r.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GizoidEggman.NAME: Data - Eggman
${modID}:GizoidEggman.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Next turn, add 3 copies of that card into your hand. Exhaust.

${modID}:GizoidKnuckles.NAME: Data - Knuckles
${modID}:GizoidKnuckles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! Plasma. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GizoidRouge.NAME: Data - Rouge
${modID}:GizoidRouge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. If Fatal, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GizoidShadow.NAME: Data - Shadow
${modID}:GizoidShadow.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GizoidSonic.NAME: Data - Sonic
${modID}:GizoidSonic.DESCRIPTION: Play Sonic Flare on ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GizoidTails.NAME: Data - Tails
${modID}:GizoidTails.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GrindRail.NAME: Grind Rail
${modID}:GrindRail.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. Swaps the cost of adjacent cards for this turn.
${modID}:GrindRail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. Swap the cost of two cards for this turn.

${modID}:HeavyBounceSlam.NAME: Heavy Bounce Slam
${modID}:HeavyBounceSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double this card's damage and increase its COST by 1.

${modID}:HomingAttack.NAME: Homing Attack
${modID}:HomingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Ring and a Trick to your hand.
${modID}:HomingAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 Rings and a Trick to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 Rings and a Trick to your hand.
Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Ring and 2 Tricks to your hand.

${modID}:InstaShield.NAME: Insta Shield
${modID}:InstaShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage. When you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage to the attacker.

${modID}:LevelUp.NAME: LevelUp
${modID}:LevelUp.DESCRIPTION: If the last card played was an... NL Nothing: Gain !M! Rings NL Atk: Gain !M! Strength NL Skill: Gain !M! Dexterity NL Power: Gain !M! Focus

${modID}:LightSpeedAttack.NAME: Light Speed Attack
${modID}:LightSpeedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. This hits an additional time for ALL Rings in combat.

${modID}:LightSpeedDash.NAME: Light Speed Dash
${modID}:LightSpeedDash.DESCRIPTION: Add a Ring to your hand until your hand is full. Play ALL of the Rings in your hand. Exhaust.

${modID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${modID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Gain Vigor for every card in your Exhaust Pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Momentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Vigor for every card in your Exhaust Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MyRainbow.NAME: My Rainbow
${modID}:MyRainbow.DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PoliteGirl.NAME: Polite Girl
${modID}:PoliteGirl.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Gain 2 Orb slots. Exhaust.
${modID}:PoliteGirl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Gain 2 Orb slots.

${modID}:PowerRing.NAME: Power Ring
${modID}:PowerRing.DESCRIPTION: When you create a card, create one more.

${modID}:PunchRush.NAME: Punch Rush
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 4 times. NL Deal !D! + !M! damage.
Deal !D! damage 4 times. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.

${modID}:Ricochet.NAME: Ricochet
${modID}:Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When you use Vigor, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Ring.NAME: Ring
${modID}:Ring.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Ring. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:QuickAir.NAME: Quick Air
${modID}:QuickAir.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If this card is most left, draw 1 card. Add Quick Step to your hand. Exhaust.
${modID}:QuickAir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If this card is most left, draw 1 card. Add Quick Step+ to your hand. Exhaust.

${modID}:QuickStep.NAME: Quick Step
${modID}:QuickStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If this card is most right, draw 1 card. Add Quick Air to your hand. Exhaust.
${modID}:QuickStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If this card is most right, draw 1 card. Add Quick Air+ to your hand. Exhaust.

${modID}:ScissorKick.NAME: Scissor Kick
${modID}:ScissorKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal an additional !M! damage for each card in your hand.

${modID}:SecretRoute.NAME: Secret Route
${modID}:SecretRoute.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Gain 1 [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Slide.NAME: Slide
${modID}:Slide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile to the top of your draw pile.

${modID}:SonicBoom.NAME: Sonic Boom
${modID}:SonicBoom.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your block.

${modID}:SonicEagle.NAME: Sonic Eagle
${modID}:SonicEagle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !M! additional damage.

${modID}:SonicFlare.NAME: Sonic Flare
${modID}:SonicFlare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Vigor by HALF of the unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:SonicIsMyName.NAME: Sonic Is My Name
${modID}:SonicIsMyName.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you play an attack card, activate the passive of effect of ALL your Orbs.

${modID}:SonicWave.NAME: Sonic Wave
${modID}:SonicWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke ALL of your Orbs.
${modID}:SonicWave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! Lightning. NL Evoke ALL of your Orbs.

${modID}:SpeedUp.NAME: Speed Up
${modID}:SpeedUp.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals 8 additional damage. NL Gain 1 [E].

${modID}:SpeedBreak.NAME: Speed Break
${modID}:SpeedBreak.DESCRIPTION: Take 3 damage for every 4 cards played. All cards in your hand cost zero for this turn.

${modID}:SpinDash.NAME: Spin Dash
${modID}:SpinDash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play the top card of your draw pile.
${modID}:SpinDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play the top card of your draw pile. NL It is upgraded for the rest of combat.

${modID}:SuperSonicForm.NAME: Super Sonic Form
${modID}:SuperSonicForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.
${modID}:SuperSonicForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
${modID}:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain !M! Temporary Dexterity.

${modID}:Teaser.NAME: Teaser
${modID}:Teaser.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Dark. NL Shuffle a Claws Unleashed into your draw pile.
${modID}:Teaser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Dark. NL Shuffle Claws Unleashed+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:TopKick.NAME: Top Kick
${modID}:TopKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Your next attack deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:ThunderShield.NAME: Thunder Shield
${modID}:ThunderShield.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Channel !M! Lightning for every Ring in your hand.

${modID}:Trick.NAME: Trick
${modID}:Trick.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL Gain 1 [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TrickFinisher.NAME: Trick Finisher
${modID}:TrickFinisher.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Double your Vigor. NL Gain 1 [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:TrickFinisher.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Double your Vigor. NL Gain 1 [E].

${modID}:TrickFinisher1.NAME: TrickFinisher
${modID}:TrickFinisher1.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL Gain 1 [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TrickFinisher2.NAME: TrickFinisher
${modID}:TrickFinisher2.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL Gain 1 [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TrickFinisher3.NAME: TrickFinisher
${modID}:TrickFinisher3.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL Gain 1 [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Trickster.NAME: Trickster
${modID}:Trickster.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Trick to your hand.
${modID}:Trickster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a Trick to your hand.

${modID}:TripleKick.NAME: Triple Kick
${modID}:TripleKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Temporary Strength. NL Add part 2 to your hand.
${modID}:TripleKick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Temporary Strength. NL Add an upgraded part 2 to your hand.

${modID}:TripleKick2.NAME: Triple Kick Part 2
${modID}:TripleKick2.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Temporary Strength. NL Add part 3 to your hand. Exhaust.
${modID}:TripleKick2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Temporary Strength. NL Add an upgraded part 3 to your hand. Exhaust.

${modID}:TripleKick3.NAME: Triple Kick Part 3
${modID}:TripleKick3.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Temporary Strength. Exhaust.
${modID}:TripleKick3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Temporary Strength. Exhaust.

${modID}:Turbulence.NAME: Turbulence
${modID}:Turbulence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a card, Channel 1 Frost.

${modID}:UnbreakableBond.NAME: Unbreakable Bond
${modID}:UnbreakableBond.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Channel 1 Plasma. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:UnbreakableBond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Channel 1 Lightning. NL Channel 1 Plasma.

${modID}:UpDraft.NAME: Up Draft
${modID}:UpDraft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Add a Ring to your hand.

${modID}:VolcanoSlider.NAME: Volcano Slider
${modID}:VolcanoSlider.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Crest_of_Fire. Exhaust all to the left of this card. Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage for each card exhausted.

${modID}:WallJump.NAME: Wall Jump
${modID}:WallJump.DESCRIPTION: Add X Rings to your hand. NL Gain !B! Block X times.

${modID}:Whirlwind.NAME: Whirlwind
${modID}:Whirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies.

${modID}:WindUpPunch.NAME: Wind Up Punch
${modID}:WindUpPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add a Trick to your hand.
${modID}:WindUpPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add 2 Tricks to your hand.

${modID}:Windmill.NAME: Windmill
${modID}:Windmill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Randomize a card's cost in your hand this turn.
